data.comment: The match has started at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a Jeonbuk goal kick.
In the minute 2, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a throw-in for Jeonbuk, close to Daegu's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Jeonbuk in Jeonju.
Daegu will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Jeonbuk.
In the minute 4, Jeonbuk's Son Jun-ho misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Jeonju.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Daegu in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Jeonbuk in their own half.
Daegu needs to be cautious. Jeonbuk have an attacking throw-in.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
Can Jeonbuk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Daegu's half?
Lee Seung-ki for Jeonbuk drives towards goal at Jeonju World Cup Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 8, Throw-in Daegu.
Cesinha is back on the pitch.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Cesinha.
In the minute 10, Daegu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Daegu at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Ball safe as Jeonbuk is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 13, Jeonbuk's Lee Dong-gook is on target but unsuccessful.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Jeonbuk in the half of Daegu.
In the minute 18, Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
Daegu have a dangerous throw-in.
Jeonbuk awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Daegu in the half of Jeonbuk.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Jeonbuk throw-in in Daegu's half.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
In the minute 24, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jeonbuk to take a throw-in in Daegu territory.
Goal kick for Daegu at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 27, Jeonbuk's Jo Gue-sung scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
Choi Cheol-sun with an assist there.
Throw-in Daegu.
In the minute 29, Daegu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jong Hyeok Kim blows against Daegu's Kim Jae-woo for offside.
Cesinha of Daegu gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 30, Jeonbuk have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Daegu in the half of Jeonbuk.
In Jeonju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 35, Lee Dong-gook (Jeonbuk) has received a first yellow card.
Park Han-Bin (Daegu) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards Jeonbuk a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Jeonbuk throw-in in Daegu's half.
Jeonbuk to take a throw-in in Daegu territory.
In the minute 40, Modou Barrow (Jeonbuk) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Jeonbuk take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Jo Gue-sung.
Ball safe as Jeonbuk is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
In the minute 44, Lee Jin-hyun is on a sub for Yoon Jong tae for Daegu.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Jeonbuk in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in Jeonju.
The second-half is underway in Jeonju.
In the minute 46, Jong Hyeok Kim awards Daegu a goal kick.
Can Jeonbuk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Daegu's half?
Free kick Jeonbuk.
In the minute 50, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Jeonbuk in their own half.
Goal kick for Jeonbuk at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Daegu are coming forward and Lee Jin-hyun gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 53, Ball goes out of play for a Jeonbuk goal kick.
Jeonbuk have a goal kick.
Daegu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 56, Kim Dae-won is replacing Dejan Damjanovic for the away team.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk in their own half.
Throw-in Jeonbuk.
In the minute 59, In Jeonju Daegu drive forward through Ryu Jae-moon. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk close to the penalty box.
Daegu's Cesinha breaks free at Jeonju World Cup Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 61, It's a goal kick for the home team in Jeonju.
Daegu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Jeonbuk.
In the minute 63, Kim Jae-woo (Daegu) has received a yellow card from Jong Hyeok Kim.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Lee Byeong-keun (Daegu) is making a third substitution, with Oh Hu-seong replacing Kim Dong-jin.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Daegu.
Throw-in for Daegu at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Kim Bo-kyung is replacing Jo Gue-sung for Jeonbuk at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 68, Can Daegu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Jeonbuk's half?
Free kick for Jeonbuk in their own half.
Lee Dong-gook (Jeonbuk) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 70, Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
Daegu have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Daegu.
In the minute 73, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a throw-in for Jeonbuk, close to Daegu's area.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards Jeonbuk a goal kick.
Free kick for Daegu in the half of Jeonbuk.
In the minute 77, Daegu to take a throw-in in Jeonbuk territory.
In Jeonju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 77, In Jeonju Daegu attack through Jo Jin-woo. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Jeonju.
Takahiro Kunimoto (Jeonbuk) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk in their own half.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Jeonbuk in the half of Daegu.
Throw-in high up the field for Jeonbuk in Jeonju.
In the minute 79, Ball safe as Daegu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jose Morais is making the team's second substitution at Jeonju World Cup Stadium with Shin Hyung-min replacing Takahiro Kunimoto.
Jeonbuk's Lee Dong-gook gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Daegu defender.
Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
In the minute 81, Free kick Daegu.
Important block from the Jeonbuk defence as Cesinha fires in a strike for Daegu.
Throw-in for Daegu close to the penalty box.
In the minute 83, Corner awarded to Daegu.
Jeonbuk drives forward and Kim Bo-kyung gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Jeonbuk drive upfield and Son Jun-ho gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Daegu defender.
In the minute 86, Jong Hyeok Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Jeonbuk get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Daegu's half?
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Jeonbuk throw-in in Daegu's half.
In the minute 86, Jong Hyeok Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
Jeonbuk pushes forward through Choi Cheol-sun, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in Daegu.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as Daegu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Daegu drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Jeonbuk throw-in in Daegu's half.
In Jeonju, Jeonbuk push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Daegu have a dangerous throw-in.
Daegu are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Oh Hu-seong of Daegu smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-0.
Jeonbuk make their third substitution with Lee Ju-yong replacing Lee Seung-ki.
